Commentary: length ball curves away from off stump and forces Lewis to check this drive. Hurriedly taps it into the covers
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Lewis, no run

Commentary: length ball slanted in at leg stump. Allows that to come on and clips it to fine leg's right off the back foot
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Lewis, 2 runs

Commentary: length ball pushed down leg side, and too far away for connection
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Lewis, 1 wide

Commentary: lifts it to the fine leg boundary. This is short, not very fast, and climbing up at Lewis' hips. He rocks back and uses the angle to ramp it over short fine. Just falls inside the rope
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Lewis, FOUR runs

Commentary: length ball swings away late outside off. Looks to drive that initially but changes his mind and lets it go
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Lewis, no run

Commentary: outside edge over short third man. Full outswinger wide outside off, chucks his bat at it and since the fielder is up, it's not fatal. Clears that man and picks up four more
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Lewis, FOUR runs

Commentary: length on leg stump, tapped to long-on on the up
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Lewis, 1 run

Commentary: full indipper starts on leg stump and fizzes past leg stump and his pads as he looks to flick. He was late on that, but the line wasn't great
Commentary_short: Mohammad Saifuddin to Lewis, 1 wide

Commentary: short of a length on leg stump, nudged to short fine's left off the back foot
Commentary_short: Mohammad Saifuddin to Lewis, 1 run

Commentary: length and just outside off, defended into the covers off the back foot
Commentary_short: Mohammad Saifuddin to Hope, no run

Commentary: short and wide outside off, some shape away. Gets the cut off the toe-end to extra cover
Commentary_short: Mohammad Saifuddin to Hope, no run

Commentary: full outswinger wide outside off, reaches out and swipes hard to bisect cover and extra cover with an uppish drive
Commentary_short: Mohammad Saifuddin to Hope, FOUR runs

Commentary: short of a length at leg stump, gets the front leg up in the air and whips this behind deep square
Commentary_short: Mohammad Saifuddin to Hope, 2 runs

Commentary: length ball in the corridor outside off, looks to pump this over midwicket on the up, beaten on the inside edge
Commentary_short: Mohammad Saifuddin to Hope, no run

Commentary: massive! Sweet hit from Lewis. Full ball floated up just outside off. No movement on it and he swings ever so cleanly and looks to go straight throughout. Over the bowler's head. Clean, and long - 104 metres
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Lewis, SIX runs

Commentary: <b>and again.<b/> Straight over the bowler. It's a slower ball this time, but it's still overpitched outside off. Waits on it a little and this time it's 92 metres
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Lewis, SIX runs

Commentary: attempted bouncer is too short and slides down leg side. Lewis lets it go
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Lewis, 1 wide

Commentary: clears the long-off boundary now! Oh he's in panic right now. He's gone seam-up, offcutter, bouncer and now he goes cross-seam. It's length outside off, and Lewis gets the front leg out to slice this over the wide long-off region
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Lewis, SIX runs

Commentary: bouncer at the chest. Looks to hook from under it, ends up slicing it into the vacant backward square leg area
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Lewis, 2 runs

Commentary: nicely bowled. A slower bouncer, climbs over off stump after it beats his pull on the under-edge
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Lewis, no run

Commentary: one more time. Lewis is unrelenting. A fourth six over the bowler! Overpitched just outside off, mid-off is still in so Lewis has no reason to try and keep this down. Clears the boundary with ease
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Lewis, SIX runs

Commentary: heaves it wide of long-on. Full ball just outside off, plants the front leg out and miscues the slog sweep, but there are only so many fielders outside in the Powerplay
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, FOUR runs

Commentary: full on leg stump, jammed down to long-on off the toe-end
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 1 run

Commentary: yorker length just outside off, no room to swing. Jams it into the covers
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Lewis, no run

Commentary: whack! Such a clean hitter. It's unreal sometimes. Mehidy lobs up his first ball this spell and he's punished immediately. It's a length ball just outside off, Lewis gets down on one knee and uses the angle into him to slog sweep with some power
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Lewis, SIX runs

Commentary: short of a length outside off, sitting up for the cut and he watches it turn before slapping it past extra cover
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Lewis, FOUR runs

Commentary: dropped! Abu Hider! Not a great evening for him so far. Length ball at middle stump, he looks to slog sweep again but drags it off the inside half. Still has some force on that. Hider can't hold on with the reverse cup at midwicket
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Lewis, 1 run

Commentary: fifty in the fifth over. Tossed up at off stump from around the wicket and he drives neatly to mid-off's left
Commentary_short: Shakib Al Hasan to Lewis, 1 run

Commentary: floated up outside off, uses the angle to slug this off the front foot. It's off the inside half and trickles past mid-on. Deep midwicket cleans up the left
Commentary_short: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, 2 runs

Commentary: clears the wide long-on boundary this time. He's made a slog look classy. Length ball at off stump and he gets right under it to swing cleanly
Commentary_short: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, SIX runs

Commentary: length at middle stump, gets on the back foot to try and flick but he closes the face too early on it. Leading edge falls safely in front of extra cover
Commentary_short: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, no run

Commentary: that's poor bowling. Short ball at middle stump. All he has to do is get deep in the crease and lift this pull over square leg
Commentary_short: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, FOUR runs

Commentary: does him with the loopy ball. Nicely done from Shakib. Lobs it right up, excruciatingly slow at a middle stump line. Hope wants to sweep but he's through it too quickly. Beaten and bowled
Commentary_short: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, OUT
Dismissal_text: SD Hope  b Shakib Al Hasan 23 (12b 3x4 1x6) SR: 191.66

Commentary: short of a length just outside off. Tapped down the pitch on the up
Commentary_short: Mohammad Saifuddin to Lewis, no run

Commentary: short ball at a leg stump line. Pulls of the toe-end to long-on's left
Commentary_short: Mohammad Saifuddin to Lewis, 2 runs

Commentary: yorker outside off, met on the full but thumped straight off the toe-end. Was looking to clear the front leg and get this wide of mid-off
Commentary_short: Mohammad Saifuddin to Lewis, no run

Commentary: bouncer in the corridor. Makes room and looks to wallop this, but it flies over the blade
Commentary_short: Mohammad Saifuddin to Lewis, no run

Commentary: clears mid-off. Not there. Not today. Full outside off and Lewis is not letting anything go from that area. Gets the front leg out of the way and drills it flat
Commentary_short: Mohammad Saifuddin to Lewis, FOUR runs

Commentary: see ya! I don't know if we can measure hits this big. Short ball at the hips, swivels and gets his weight moving away from the ball so he can get leverage on this. And then swipes to get it right off the middle and far far over square leg. A good over flips upside down in two balls. 107 metres!
Commentary_short: Mohammad Saifuddin to Lewis, SIX runs

Commentary: short ball at the front shoulder. Late on the hook but he's safe as this lobs over the keeper. Short fine cleans up
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Paul, 2 runs

Commentary: short ball cuts away from middle stump and squares him up. Watches it closely as he looks to defend and is wrapped on the knuckles
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Paul, no run

Commentary: taken at deep square! Clears the front leg and looks to get inside the line to break the shackles on this short bowling. Looks to pull it far, but it was rising on him all the time. Slices it up and it is taken
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Paul, OUT
Dismissal_text: KMA Paul c Ariful Haque b Mustafizur Rahman 2 (3b 0x4 0x6) SR: 66.66

Commentary: clears long-off! Wow. If you don't bowl outside off, he'll just walk into the leg side and hit it there anyway. Full and in at leg stump. Exposes all the stumps and slaps it flat to clear the fielder in the deep
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Lewis, SIX runs

Commentary: short ball in the corridor, gets on top of it and tucks it to deep square
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Lewis, 1 run

Commentary: short of a length and angling away from off stump. Jabs at it and gets a thick outside edge down to third man
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Powell, 1 run

Commentary: full and loopy at a middle stump line. He's through early on the slog sweep. Drags it between deep square and deep midwicket
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Powell, 2 runs

Commentary: length ball pushed through flat and across off stump. Beats the outside edge as he looks to poke through cover
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Powell, no run

Commentary: yorker length outside off, looks to jam it out and is beaten
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Powell, no run

Commentary: length at leg stump, flicked to short fine's left
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Powell, 1 run

Commentary: clears long-on! Full ball at off stump, swings at it, gets it off the low part of the bat and the face is closed. But he's got enough to beat long-on to his right
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Lewis, SIX runs

Commentary: short of a length outside off, backs away and slaps to long-off
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Lewis, 1 run

Commentary: length ball pushed wide outside off from around the wicket, left alone
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Lewis, 1 wide

Commentary: shot! Crafty. Mustafiz going around the wicket is giving Lewis the angle he usually gives a right hander. Except he always has a third man for the right hander. For Lewis, that man is in. He gets behind the line and chops it deftly
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Lewis, FOUR runs

Commentary: aaaaand once more. This is not a great ploy from Mustafiz. Short and angled across him again, and he cuts it wider of short third man now
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Lewis, FOUR runs

Commentary: short ball in the corridor, arches back and lets it go. That got big on him
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Lewis, no run

Commentary: full on leg stump, gets the front leg out of the way and drives along the floor to long-on's left
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Lewis, 2 runs

Commentary: offcutter at a length, wide outside off. Swipes at it and is beaten
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Lewis, no run

Commentary: full toss at leg stump, taps it down to long-on
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Lewis, 1 run

Commentary: dropped short outside off, hammered to long-off's right off the back foot and Powell is very alert to the fielder's languid approach. Pinches the second to get Lewis back in strike
Commentary_short: Mahmudullah to Lewis, 2 runs

Commentary: hits off stump! That's good, experienced bowling. Like Shakib had done earlier, Mahmudullah slows it down and Lewis is through the shot early. An attempted slog sweep goes past the inside edge and the bullying ends for the home team. What an innings from Lewis.
Commentary_short: Mahmudullah to Lewis, OUT

Commentary: Hetmyer reviews the lbw straight away. Mahmudullah back around the wicket, tosses it up and hits the pad as Hetmyer looks to flick. Looked very adjacent that, but has he got bat on it? Ultra Edge says no edge. And it's clipping leg stump. Umpire's call. West Indies retain the review, but they have a collapse to contend with now. And Mahmudullah is on a hat-trick.
Commentary_short: Mahmudullah to Hetmyer, OUT
Dismissal_text: SO Hetmyer lbw b Mahmudullah 0 (1b 0x4 0x6) SR: 0.00

Commentary: short of a length just outside off, gets deep in the crease and slices it to point
Commentary_short: Mahmudullah to Pooran, no run

Commentary: full on off stump, tapped back to the bowler
Commentary_short: Mahmudullah to Pooran, no run

Commentary: length ball at off stump, driven on the rise to long-off
Commentary_short: Mahmudullah to Pooran, 1 run

Commentary: so easy. Wow. With a line-up like theirs, there's no way West Indies are going to rebuild. That is for lesser mortals, says Pooran, as he gets the front leg out of the way and launches Shakib flat over the wide long-on boundary
Commentary_short: Shakib Al Hasan to Pooran, SIX runs

Commentary: full on leg stump, pushed back to the bowler
Commentary_short: Shakib Al Hasan to Pooran, no run

Commentary: length at off stump, tapped to extra cover
Commentary_short: Shakib Al Hasan to Pooran, no run

Commentary: this is good bowling. Slow and short of a length outside off. Steps out and is forced to push feebly into the leg side
Commentary_short: Shakib Al Hasan to Pooran, no run

Commentary: short of a length across off stump, hits the toe and rolls into the off side as it keep low. He was looking to punch into the leg side
Commentary_short: Shakib Al Hasan to Pooran, no run

Commentary: short of a length at middle stump, punched straight to short midwicket
Commentary_short: Shakib Al Hasan to Pooran, no run

Commentary: short and wide outside off, cuts it straight to extra cover
Commentary_short: Mahmudullah to Powell, no run

Commentary: short of a length at leg stump, nudged to midwicket's left off the back foot
Commentary_short: Mahmudullah to Powell, 1 run

Commentary: short and wide outside off, mistimed cut to sweeper's right
Commentary_short: Mahmudullah to Pooran, 1 run

Commentary: full outside off, driven to long-off
Commentary_short: Mahmudullah to Powell, 1 run

Commentary: full on leg stump, driven to long-on
Commentary_short: Mahmudullah to Pooran, 1 run

Commentary: short of a length and pushed wide outside off. Mistimed cut rolls out to long-off
Commentary_short: Mahmudullah to Powell, 1 run

Commentary: tossed up at leg stump. Steps out and looks to pump it straight, but he gets an inside edge to short fine
Commentary_short: Shakib Al Hasan to Powell, no run

Commentary: stays in the crease this time and is much better balanced as he slogs this over deep midwicket! Full ball, always coming in with the angle, and he swings cleanly at it
Commentary_short: Shakib Al Hasan to Powell, SIX runs

Commentary: beaten in flight. Length ball at off stump. Steps out but is forced to get behind and defend
Commentary_short: Shakib Al Hasan to Powell, no run

Commentary: full outside off, creams it along the floor to long-on
Commentary_short: Shakib Al Hasan to Powell, 1 run

Commentary: over the square leg boundary. Dropped short at a leg stump line, from around the wicket. Pooran's not letting that go. Gets back in the crease and pulls imperiously
Commentary_short: Shakib Al Hasan to Pooran, SIX runs

Commentary: drilled. Long-off has no chance, ten yards to his right. This is full and outside off and he stays leg side of it before chucking the bat at it
Commentary_short: Shakib Al Hasan to Pooran, FOUR runs

Commentary: length ball fired down leg side from around the wicket, past the attempted flick
Commentary_short: Mahmudullah to Powell, 1 wide

Commentary: oh wow. Well adjusted. Dropped short outside off and he wants to hammer this with a flat bat. It sticks in the pitch a little through so he places it - wide of long-off, on the rise
Commentary_short: Mahmudullah to Powell, FOUR runs

Commentary: length at middle stump, tapped into the midwicket region
Commentary_short: Mahmudullah to Powell, 1 run

Commentary: floated up slow outside off. Looks to whip it inside-out, gets an inside edge through square leg
Commentary_short: Mahmudullah to Pooran, 1 run

Commentary: length ball pushed past and wide outside off, left alone
Commentary_short: Mahmudullah to Powell, 1 wide

Commentary: finds deep midwicket! It looks like an attempted quicker ball that has gone wrong. Dropped short at a middle stump line and so he looks to pull it. But it skids through quickly enough to disrupt his swing and he is taken on the line
Commentary_short: Mahmudullah to Powell, OUT
Dismissal_text: R Powell c Liton Das b Mahmudullah 19 (16b 1x4 1x6) SR: 118.75

Commentary: full on leg stump, clipped into the midwicket region and Mahmudullah is across quickly to his right to whip a throw back to the keeper. Pooran is diving...it's been sent upstairs. And he has made it. That was unnecessary from West Indies. But they survive.
Commentary_short: Mahmudullah to Brathwaite, 1 run

Commentary: another mix-up, but Brathwaite survives this time at the other end. Short of a length ball at leg stump, pokes into the leg side with soft hands and sends his captain back
Commentary_short: Mahmudullah to Pooran, no run

Commentary: offcutter, short of a length and in the corridor. Watches closely and guides it to third man
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Brathwaite, 1 run

Commentary: quick bouncer, nicely directed. Climbs past his attempted hook
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Pooran, no run

Commentary: short of a length in the corridor, punched to point off the back foot
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Pooran, no run

Commentary: short ball at the hips, pulled straight at the leg umpire. And he hits him too. Deflected to deep square's right off his thigh guard. He's alright.
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Pooran, 2 runs

Commentary: oh poor line. But nice field awareness from Pooran. Short one rising at his hip, gets the front leg across and in the air as he shovels this past short fine. Deep square runs across and puts in a slide, but the momentum takes it into the boundary
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Pooran, FOUR runs

Commentary: short of a length outside off, uppish slice to third man
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Pooran, 1 run

Commentary: full ball just outside off. Looks to clobber it through cover, but that skids low and past the inside edge
Commentary_short: Mohammad Saifuddin to Pooran, no run

Commentary: slower ball at a length outside off. Gets down for the ramp but he has to adjust for the change in pace. Gently taps into the leg side
Commentary_short: Mohammad Saifuddin to Pooran, 1 run

Commentary: yorker wide outside off. Brathwaite looks to chop it and is beaten. Just above the wide marker and a somewhat cruel wide call
Commentary_short: Mohammad Saifuddin to Brathwaite, 1 wide

Commentary: yorker at off stump, jabbed past the bowler to mid-off. Off the toe-end
Commentary_short: Mohammad Saifuddin to Brathwaite, 1 run

Commentary: full and wide outside off, slices on the up to third man
Commentary_short: Mohammad Saifuddin to Pooran, 1 run

Commentary: ooof get out of the way. Slower ball is dropped short and sits up for him. He gets on the front foot and spanks this between deep square and deep midwicket
Commentary_short: Mohammad Saifuddin to Brathwaite, FOUR runs

Commentary: well bowled. Yorker just outside off, looks to carve to third man but is beaten
Commentary_short: Mohammad Saifuddin to Brathwaite, no run

Commentary: nicely taken at third man! Abu Hider has something to celebrate. Short ball outside off, Pooran loses his shape as he slashes at it with his feet moving into the leg side. Thick outside edge loops up and dips to Hider's left but he lunges to hold on
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Pooran, OUT
Dismissal_text: N Pooran c Abu Hider b Mustafizur Rahman 29 (24b 2x4 2x6) SR: 120.83

Commentary: slower ball, short of a length and just outside off. Tickles it to third man
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Brathwaite, 1 run

Commentary: inside edge over the stumps and to the keeper's right. Short of a length ball in the corridor and he stabs at it away from the body
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Rutherford, no run

Commentary: offcutter jumps up from a length just outside off. Shapes to punch through the off side but this ends up at midwicket off the glove
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Rutherford, 1 run

Commentary: and taken at gully! Sharp captaincy from Shakib. Bratwaite's only been looking to poke Mustafiz down to third man, so they cut out that option. It's a length ball, offcutter outside off, and he has a slash at it. Thick edge goes straight to the fielder
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Brathwaite, OUT
Dismissal_text: CR Brathwaite c Mehidy Hasan Miraz b Mustafizur Rahman 8 (7b 1x4 0x6) SR: 114.28

Commentary: slower ball at a length on leg stump. Pushed into the leg side off the front foot
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Allen, 1 run

Commentary: short and wide and rising steeply outside off. Looks to cut but that has flown past
Commentary_short: Mohammad Saifuddin to Allen, no run

Commentary: full toss at off stump. Opens up and looks to slap it through cover, gets a thick inside edge to long-on
Commentary_short: Mohammad Saifuddin to Allen, 1 run

Commentary: yorker outside off, sliced uppishly to third man
Commentary_short: Mohammad Saifuddin to Rutherford, 1 run

Commentary: swipes it to the midwicket boundary. Midwicket inside the circle and he hasn't made great connection, but his radar is right. Short ball outside off and a hurried swipe to fine the boundary
Commentary_short: Mohammad Saifuddin to Allen, FOUR runs

Commentary: yorker outside off, swinging away late as he looks to chop it down to third man. Beaten
Commentary_short: Mohammad Saifuddin to Allen, no run

Commentary: full toss on leg stump, clipped to deep square's right
Commentary_short: Mohammad Saifuddin to Allen, 2 runs

Commentary: full and just outside off. Looks to slog it, beaten on the inside edge. Rahim can't hold on
Commentary_short: Shakib Al Hasan to Rutherford, 1 bye

Commentary: beaten in flight and he's too far down to save himself. Superb. Slow and landing at a length and he's through the shot and nearly falling over as this spins past him, marginally
Commentary_short: Shakib Al Hasan to Allen, OUT
Dismissal_text: FA Allen st †Mushfiqur Rahim b Shakib Al Hasan 8 (7b 1x4 0x6) SR: 114.28

Commentary: length at middle stump, gets on the front foot and jabs at it. Gets an inside edge onto pad and it lobs into the leg side. They steal a single pitch side
Commentary_short: Shakib Al Hasan to Cottrell, 1 run

Commentary: length ball flat and skidded away outside off. Looks to drive on the up and is beaten on the outside edge
Commentary_short: Shakib Al Hasan to Rutherford, no run

Commentary: caught-behind! Arm ball, at a length and across the corridor. He looks for the slog sweep and gets a leading edge that slams into Rahim's left pectoral muscle. He recovers to hold on
Commentary_short: Shakib Al Hasan to Rutherford, OUT
Dismissal_text: SE Rutherford c †Mushfiqur Rahim b Shakib Al Hasan 2 (6b 0x4 0x6) SR: 33.33

Commentary: length outside off, defended into the off side off the back foot
Commentary_short: Shakib Al Hasan to Thomas, no run

Commentary: length on leg stump, tapped into the leg side of the back foot
Commentary_short: Mahmudullah to Cottrell, 1 run

Commentary: mix-up and he won't even get halfway down as the bowler clips the bails off. The umpire probably wants to check if he collected cleanly and took it off with the ball in hand. Because he has sent this upstairs. And that will be out because he has the ball in his hand as his elbow dislodges the bails. For good measure, he also pulls the stumps out. That's good. Length ball hit him on the thigh as he looked to flick and dribbled into the leg side. He switched off to the possibility of the run and was caught napping
Commentary_short: Mahmudullah to Thomas, OUT
Dismissal_text: O Thomas run out (Liton Das/Mahmudullah) 0 (2b 0x4 0x6) SR: 0.00

Commentary: short of length outside off, Tamim looks to upper cut it, jumps in the air, both feet off the ground, but fails to connect
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Tamim Iqbal, no run

Commentary: a full toss outside off, driven behind point, third man cuts it off. Bangladesh are off the mark
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

Commentary: length ball, swinging back to cut the batsman in half who was backing away
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Liton Das, no run

Commentary: short of length, good bounce and carry but down the leg side, needs to be bowled again
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Liton Das, 1 wide

Commentary: short of length on middle and leg, no room at all for Liton, dabs it towards covers for a quick single
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Liton Das, 1 run

Commentary: down the track and swings hard, not the intended direction but the desired result, flies over first slip to hit the skirting on the full, first six of the Bangladesh innings
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Tamim Iqbal, SIX runs

Commentary: another short one, goes for the pull but misses, sloppy work from Hope behind the stumps allows a bye
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Tamim Iqbal, 1 bye

Commentary: starts with a bouncer, Tamim was shuffling in the crease but ducks under in time, but, but it's a big front-foot no ball
Commentary_short: Thomas to Tamim Iqbal, 1 no ball

Commentary: backs away, looks to smash it over midwicket, the bottom hand comes off as he ends up skying it towards the bowler who settles under but cannot hold on, doesn't matter, was a free hit, the batsmen sneak in a single
Commentary_short: Thomas to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

Commentary: short of length, exposing his stumps and aims to hit on the up, through the covers, misses
Commentary_short: Thomas to Liton Das, no run

Commentary: another no ball, was short of length aimed at the batsman, Liton has shown his cards here, he's going to back away and look to smash it on the off side, a no ball for height it looks like
Commentary_short: Thomas to Liton Das, 1 no ball

Commentary: length, on middle, Liton stays in his position this time and pulls it over deep square leg for his first six of the match
Commentary_short: Thomas to Liton Das, SIX runs

Commentary: another short of length delivery but down the leg side this time
Commentary_short: Thomas to Liton Das, 1 wide

Commentary: length on middle and leg, tucked away past square leg, who chases and pulls it just inside. The batsmen are coming back for the third, a good throw by Rovman Powell to the keeper who breaks the stumps. The umpires are checking upstairs, and whoa, he's well short here. He was getting ready to take strike
Commentary_short: Thomas to Liton Das, 2 runs, OUT

Commentary: fuller and wider, Soumya throws his bat at it, the ball hits the bottom part of the bat and flies towards third man
Commentary_short: Thomas to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

Commentary: length outside off, moving away from the batsman who pushes it up and over, the point fielder jumps to his right, gets his hand to it but it just evades him
Commentary_short: Thomas to Liton Das, FOUR runs

Commentary: fuller outside off, throws his bat at it but fails to connect
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Soumya Sarkar, no run

Commentary: length but angling down the leg side, another extra
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Soumya Sarkar, 1 wide

Commentary: back of length outside off, goes for the cut but the extra bounce beats him
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Soumya Sarkar, no run

Commentary: back of length, cramping the batsman for the room, looks to open the face of the bat at the last moment, no contact
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Soumya Sarkar, no run

Commentary: a touch fuller this time, Soumya was moving away but it's way too down, another wide
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Soumya Sarkar, 1 wide

Commentary: fuller on middle and leg, sliding towards the batsman who misses and gets struck on the pads, was clearly missing the leg stump
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Soumya Sarkar, no run

Commentary: a quick bouncer, Soumya was on the front foot, sways away just in time
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Soumya Sarkar, no run

Commentary: short outside off, balloons over after landing, eludes Soumya who was jumping in the air to get something on it, that's the second bouncer of the over, another free-hit coming up
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Soumya Sarkar, 1 no ball

Commentary: length, angled towards leg, Soumya backs away and pulls, a top-edge to Thomas at short fine who once again drops it off the free hit
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Soumya Sarkar, 2 runs

Commentary: short and wide this time, Liton cuts it up and over the covers for a maximum, great connection there
Commentary_short: Thomas to Liton Das, SIX runs

Commentary: back of length, aimed at the batsman, defended towards cover
Commentary_short: Thomas to Liton Das, no run

Commentary: length but width outside off, Liton cuts it over point this time, a couple of bounces and over the boundary
Commentary_short: Thomas to Liton Das, FOUR runs

Commentary: length outside off, steered towards wide short third man, who shies at the striker's end to break the stumps, Liton was comfortably in
Commentary_short: Thomas to Liton Das, no run

Commentary: length outside off, picked up non-chalantly, without any fuss, bounces just inside the deep midwicket fence. Given a no ball but replays shows the was a wrong call
Commentary_short: Thomas to Liton Das, (no ball) FOUR runs

Commentary: clears his front leg and smashes this length ball over long-on, all the way for a six
Commentary_short: Thomas to Liton Das, SIX runs

Commentary: this has been that kind of an innings, down the leg side this time, another wide
Commentary_short: Thomas to Liton Das, 1 wide

Commentary: fuller around off, Liton looks to go over long-off, ends up slicing it to mid-off who takes it comfortably, but that's been given a no ball, WAIT! Replays show Thomas had some part of his foot behind the line. Looks like the West Indies fielders have seen it on the big screen, Brathwaite wants to review it, not sure if you can review line decisions.
Commentary_short: Thomas to Liton Das, (no ball) 1 run

Commentary: short of length, Soumya backs away and cuts it over cover-point and it sails all the way for a six
Commentary_short: Thomas to Soumya Sarkar, SIX runs

Commentary: fuller on the stumps, swept and swept fine, short fine leg chases it to keep it to three
Commentary_short: Allen to Liton Das, 3 runs

Commentary: fuller outside off, was in the arc, Soumya goes for it but does't the timing right, ends up hitting to the long-on fielder who takes a couple of steps forward and takes it near knee height
Commentary_short: Allen to Soumya Sarkar, OUT
Dismissal_text: Soumya Sarkar c Cottrell b Allen 9 (10b 0x4 1x6) SR: 90.00

Commentary: a similar delivery and a very similar shot, looks to clear long-on, doesn't get the distance, Cottrell takes another good catch, had to take a couple steps more as compared to the last one, grabs it a tad low, tumbles forward after grabbing it, Allen on a hat-trick now
Commentary_short: Allen to Shakib Al Hasan, OUT
Dismissal_text: Shakib Al Hasan c Cottrell b Allen 0 (1b 0x4 0x6) SR: 0.00

Commentary: length outside off, cuts it straight to the cover
Commentary_short: Allen to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

Commentary: length outside off, punches it off the back foot towards long-on
Commentary_short: Allen to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

Commentary: short of length outside off, a little bit of turn, another cut but straight to cover
Commentary_short: Allen to Liton Das, no run

Commentary: fuller around off, Mushfiqur drives it but straight to mid-off
Commentary_short: Paul to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

Commentary: fuller and a touch wider this time, hits it towards cover-point off the front foot
Commentary_short: Paul to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

Commentary: short of length, looked like it came a tad slower off the surface, Mushfiqur pushes at it, on the up and ends up hitting it straight down the backward point's lap, Bangladesh are suddenly 66 for 4
Commentary_short: Paul to Mushfiqur Rahim, OUT
Dismissal_text: Mushfiqur Rahim c Allen b Paul 1 (5b 0x4 0x6) SR: 20.00

Commentary: fuller on the stumps, smashed but straight to mid-on
Commentary_short: Paul to Mahmudullah, no run

Commentary: fuller outside off, driven on the up but in the gap, between cover and point for four
Commentary_short: Paul to Mahmudullah, FOUR runs

Commentary: length outside off, pushes it towards extra cover from the crease
Commentary_short: Paul to Mahmudullah, no run

Commentary: short of length, on the stumps, pulls it towards backward square leg
Commentary_short: Allen to Liton Das, 1 run

Commentary: fuller, outside leg, Mahmudullah backs away and hits it inside out over extra cover, brilliant execution
Commentary_short: Allen to Mahmudullah, FOUR runs

Commentary: arm ball, on middle and leg, the ball takes the inner half and rolls towards short fine leg, a bit of a fumble there
Commentary_short: Allen to Mahmudullah, no run

Commentary: fuller on the stumps, worked away towards square leg
Commentary_short: Allen to Mahmudullah, 1 run

Commentary: short of length, sticking in the surface, Liton checks his shot and hits it towards midwicket
Commentary_short: Allen to Liton Das, 1 run

Commentary: short of length, backs away and hits it straight back, Allen dives across but couldn't prevent the single
Commentary_short: Allen to Mahmudullah, 1 run

Commentary: short and wide and cuts it past backward point, looks like he got some hand on it, the sweeper cover cuts it off
Commentary_short: Paul to Mahmudullah, 1 run

Commentary: fuller around off, looks to drive, gets an inside edge on the pads, the ball rolls on the off side
Commentary_short: Paul to Liton Das, 1 run

Commentary: length ball, Mahmudullah looks to go over the top, and up chipping it to Brathwaite at mid-off, that's a big wicket, maybe the match and hence, the series
Commentary_short: Paul to Mahmudullah, OUT
Dismissal_text: Mahmudullah c Brathwaite b Paul 11 (9b 2x4 0x6) SR: 122.22

Commentary: length outside off, comes forward and pushes it towards cover-point
Commentary_short: Paul to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

Commentary: length around off, comes forward and drives it to cover again
Commentary_short: Paul to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

Commentary: pitched up, another front foot drive, this time straight to mid-off
Commentary_short: Paul to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

Commentary: length on middle and leg, swept past short fine leg, the deep backward square leg cuts it off
Commentary_short: Allen to Liton Das, 2 runs

Commentary: length on middle and leg, goes for the sweep and misses, struck on the pads, and given lbw. Liton reviews it straightaway, no bat involved. Pitched in line, struck in line but going over the stumps. Liton survives again
Commentary_short: Allen to Liton Das, no run

Commentary: fuller outside off, pushes it back towards the bowler
Commentary_short: Allen to Liton Das, no run

Commentary: looks to come down the track but Allen shortens his length, stays in his crease and pushes it on the off side
Commentary_short: Allen to Liton Das, no run

Commentary: swept along the ground towards deep midwicket
Commentary_short: Allen to Liton Das, 1 run

Commentary: length on middle and leg, tucked away towards square leg, takes the first run quickly but the fielding charges towards the ball to prevent the second
Commentary_short: Allen to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run

Commentary: down the track, reaches to the pitch of the ball and lofts it over mid-off, one bounce and over the boundary line
Commentary_short: Paul to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, FOUR runs

Commentary: fuller outside off, steers it through covers, sweeper patrolling the fence
Commentary_short: Paul to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run

Commentary: length outside off, looks to hit across the line, the fails its the outer half and lobs towards mid-off, Brathwaite takes another catch there, Bangladesh really struggling now
Commentary_short: Paul to Liton Das, OUT
Dismissal_text: Liton Das c Brathwaite b Paul 43 (25b 3x4 3x6) SR: 172.00

Commentary: short of length outside off, goes for the pull, not in the control as it hurries on to him, a simple catch by debutant Rutherford near short midwicket. Keemo Paul is on a hat-trick now, third bowler this evening to take two-in-two
Commentary_short: Paul to Ariful Haque, OUT
Dismissal_text: Ariful Haque c Rutherford b Paul 0 (1b 0x4 0x6) SR: 0.00

Commentary: fuller around off, driven firmly back at the bowler
Commentary_short: Paul to Mohammad Saifuddin, no run

Commentary: short of length, angling towards the rib cage, the batsman lets it hit the body, to the keeper
Commentary_short: Paul to Mohammad Saifuddin, no run

Commentary: fuller but down the leg side, goes for the sweep, no connection there
Commentary_short: Allen to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 wide

Commentary: short of length outside off, looks to cut and misses
Commentary_short: Allen to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

Commentary: short of length outside off, cuts it straight to the cover-point
Commentary_short: Allen to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

Commentary: length outside off, goes for the cut and misses
Commentary_short: Allen to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

Commentary: slower in the air, length outside off, pushed on the off side
Commentary_short: Allen to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

Commentary: short of length outside off, goes for the pull but ends up hitting it down the ground, was in the air but away from the bowler, on his left
Commentary_short: Allen to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run

Commentary: length ball on middle and leg, tucked away towards short fine leg
Commentary_short: Allen to Mohammad Saifuddin, 1 run

Commentary: short of length outside off, gets away from the line
Commentary_short: Paul to Mohammad Saifuddin, no run

Commentary: short from around the wicket and pulled away behind square, struck firmly, the fine fielder puts in a dive, gets his hand to it but cannot stop the boundary
Commentary_short: Paul to Mohammad Saifuddin, FOUR runs

Commentary: length ball, angling in, the batsman skips down and takes a wild swing, misses
Commentary_short: Paul to Mohammad Saifuddin, no run

Commentary: a bouncer outside off, goes for the pull, gets a faint edge and Hope takes a regulation catch, appeals for it and almost gestured there for a review but the finger just went up. And that's a five-wicket haul of Paul
Commentary_short: Paul to Mohammad Saifuddin, OUT
Dismissal_text: Mohammad Saifuddin c †Hope b Paul 5 (7b 1x4 0x6) SR: 71.42

Commentary: short of length outside off, defended
Commentary_short: Paul to Abu Hider, no run

Commentary: short again, a half-pull but straight to the square leg fielder
Commentary_short: Paul to Abu Hider, no run

Commentary: short of length outside off, backs away and throws his bat at it, misses
Commentary_short: Thomas to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

Commentary: short of length outside off, an upper cut from Mehidy, an easy catch for Rutherford at third man, he comes in, gets settled under and...spills
Commentary_short: Thomas to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run

Commentary: short of length, hurries on to the batsman who goes for the pull, gets a top edge over the keeper's head
Commentary_short: Thomas to Abu Hider, 1 run

Commentary: bouncer again, on middle and leg, goes for the pull and misses
Commentary_short: Thomas to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

Commentary: a touch fuller around off, driven through covers, they are coming back for the second, a direct hit at the keeper's end but Hider was in, they run an overthrow off the deflection
Commentary_short: Thomas to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 3 runs

Commentary: full, angling on the pads, picked away towards square leg for four
Commentary_short: Thomas to Abu Hider, FOUR runs

Commentary: fuller and wider, Mehidy gives himself some room by taking his left leg out and lofts it over extra cover, sails all the way
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, SIX runs

Commentary: length outside off, pushes it towards deep backward point off the back foot
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run

Commentary: short of length around off, Hider swivels to pull it over deep midwicket, second six of the over
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Abu Hider, SIX runs

Commentary: fuller, angled on the stumps, defended back
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Abu Hider, no run

Commentary: short of length outside off, looks to guide it to third man, misses
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Abu Hider, no run

Commentary: fuller outside off and driven crisply through cover-point, 17 from that over. Is there a twist left in this game?
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Abu Hider, FOUR runs

Commentary: short of length, down the track and looks to pull it, gets an under edge towards fine leg
Commentary_short: Brathwaite to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run

Commentary: a bouncer, on middle and leg, Hider misses the pull
Commentary_short: Brathwaite to Abu Hider, no run

Commentary: on the pads this time and flicked away fine, the fine leg fielder puts in the dive but cannot stop the boundary
Commentary_short: Brathwaite to Abu Hider, FOUR runs

Commentary: length on middle and leg, chipped away towards deep midwicket, was in the air but well short of the fielder
Commentary_short: Brathwaite to Abu Hider, 2 runs

Commentary: short of length, angling towards the batsman, cramps him for the room, hitting him near the thigh
Commentary_short: Brathwaite to Abu Hider, no run

Commentary: short of length outside off, defended on the off side
Commentary_short: Brathwaite to Abu Hider, no run

Commentary: short of length around off, goes for the pull but ends up slicing it towards short third man, extra bounce doing the trick there and an easy catch for Allen. West Indies one wicket away now
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, OUT
Dismissal_text: Mehidy Hasan Miraz c Allen b Cottrell 19 (19b 1x4 1x6) SR: 100.00

Commentary: a high full toss around off, defended back
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Mustafizur Rahman, no run

Commentary: short of length around off, Mustafizur was looking to guide it to third man, misses
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Mustafizur Rahman, no run

Commentary: fuller, down the leg side, hits the pads on its way to the keeper who fails to make a clean stop
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Mustafizur Rahman, 1 leg bye

Commentary: length ball, on middle and leg, moves across and looks to work it fine, misses. An appeal for caught-behind. Not out, says the umpire. Brathwaite wants to review it, but the ball was not even close to the bat
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Abu Hider, no run

Commentary: length outside off, pushes at it and gets beaten
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Abu Hider, no run

Commentary: fuller around off and lunched over long-off, all the way for a six
Commentary_short: Brathwaite to Mustafizur Rahman, SIX runs

Commentary: good comeback by Brathwaite, slips in a bouncer to put the batsman in all sorts of tangle, a tumbling Mustafizur somehow manages to sway away
Commentary_short: Brathwaite to Mustafizur Rahman, no run

Commentary: short again, angled towards the batsman who backs away and dabs it towards third man at the last moment
Commentary_short: Brathwaite to Mustafizur Rahman, 1 run

Commentary: fuller on middle and leg, a wild swing but misses and gets hit on the pads, an appeal for lbw but that was heading down, they collect two leg-byes as the ball goes towards third man
Commentary_short: Brathwaite to Abu Hider, 2 leg byes

Commentary: short of length, backs away and goes for the pull, ends up toe-ending it towards long-on
Commentary_short: Brathwaite to Abu Hider, 1 run

Commentary: full and straight, Mustafizur was backing away, exposes his stumps and the middle stump is uprooted, and that's the game and the series
Commentary_short: Brathwaite to Mustafizur Rahman, OUT
